r= 992466204821150537412473479152874338348039576316296274241

the length of e is  998


x= 562131147532793395796992468780064880959631404807917870261


b0= -


e*r-x*phi-s= 0




alpha= 0.9992
delta= 0.1896
beta= 0.4987
gamma= 0.1848


To check that 2-0.5*gamma-4*beta<delta<1-0.5*gamma-sqrt(alpha*(2*beta-0.5)), the answer must be true


True


2-0.5*gamma-4*beta= -0.08719


delta= 0.1896


1-0.5*gamma-sqrt(alpha*(2*beta-0.5))= 0.2026


To check that 2*beta-0.5<alpha<8*beta-2 the answer must be true


True


2*beta-0.5= 0.4974


alpha= 0.9992


8*beta-2= 1.990


To check that |s|<inf(|er|,|xu|), the answer must be true


True


|s|= 35768961998780180107992475359402331875982515709603367423


inf(|er|,|xu|)= 48340160451145142583040827517056017420011757381219974886303820493374840386779741271167715817292005451455787633265747379412021727795866750430105043492077834709690162984112601176450363897527155323409538635768


T at the root (z1,z2,z3) modulo e must be zero


Mod(T(z1,z2,z3),e)= 0


theta at the root (z1,z4) modulo e must be zero


Mod(theta(z1,z4),e)= 0

d= 


d=N^(delta0) with delta0= 0.9997
